name: Theatrhythm Dragon Quest
overview: Theatrhythm Dragon Quest is very similar to the Theatrhythm Final Fantasy games. The game features music from Dragon Quest 1 - 10 and is divided into Field, Battle, and Event sections. The player creates a party of chibi characters taken from the first 10 Dragon Quest games and must hit the notes (with the touch screen or buttons) in time with the music to travel between destinations, defeat enemies, and complete special events.
